Reykjavík

Beautiful city in the middle of Atlantic.

  • Home
  • Travel
  • Cooking
  1. Travel
  2. Iceland
  3. Reykjavík

City of Reykjavik is incredibly beautiful. New buildings are mixing with old homes which gives city unique vibe. There are plenty of bicycle lanes and sidewalks around coastline. I particularly enjoyed driving around on rental kick scooter. We even saw “legendary” heated sidewalks being built. They are real! :D

There are plenty of things to see in Reykjavik even in Covid times. Hallgrimskirkja church and Cathedral of Christ the King being one of my favorites. As well as forests and view of the city around Perlan.

And of course, we tried the best hot dog in Reykjavik - Bæjarins Beztu Pylsur. It was delicious and surprisingly cheap on Icelandic measures. Thanks to that we had quite few of those during our stay… Well, it was our honeymoon after all. :P
